verbs.description: [ARG0: he] [V: promised] [ARG2: to protect their dogs during hurricane michael] then the walls collapsed for six years charles burgess ran pawaday inn building up a loyal customer base that brought him their beloved dogs and cats for grooming and boarding charles burgess hurricane michael
